extension.name: HikaShop R2H free product plugin
extension.author: Rick Spaan
extension.description:
How to use this plugin

Activate the plugin
Add a category that is not in the default product listing, in most cases the root. This way the product is by default not visible.
Add a product to this category with the price of 0.
Remember the Hikashop product ID and add it to the product ID field in this plugin.
Set the quantity and the minimum price at which the free product will be added.

field.name: free_prod_id
field.label: Product ID
field.description: Get the free product Hikashop ID.

field.name: free_prod_quantity
field.label: Quantity
field.description: The quantity of the free product that will be added to the cart.

field.name: free_prod_price
field.label: Minimum price
field.description: Fill the minimum price ad which the free product will be added.
